attributes.action: Prevent the proposed changes to Durham market place and keep it how it is!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of the regeneration of Durham, the council proposes many changes to it's market place. We feel that the market place is a key element of Durham's historic character and the proposed changes(moving the statues,introduction of terraces and fountains) will ruin this. All we want is for our market place to stay the way we like it.
